elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Who is actually allowed to do what in a suspected case? Allocate.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Learners
choices: Accompany the customer to an undisturbed place (e.g. office) and kindly ask them to empty their bags
Carry out bag or body searches (even against the person's will)

elements.title: Specialist
choices: Accompany the customer to an undisturbed place (e.g. office) and kindly ask them to empty their bags
Carry out bag or body searches (even against the person's will)
correctAnswer: Accompany the customer to an undisturbed place (e.g. office) and kindly ask them to empty their bags
